pageContext.claim: “They [China] pay us now tens of billions of dollars. I took a small portion of it, I added it up 16 and 12, 28. And I said, ‘$28 billion is going to the farmers.’ Did everybody get that money, right?”
pageContext.analysis: It's more complicated than Trump suggests. China cut agricultural purchases from the United States in response to Trump's tariffs, requiring bailouts to farmers left in the lurch.
